00016 class FileIO;
00017 class DataPool;
00018 
00019 class Segment;
00020 
00021 class MSWell : public Well 
00022 {
00023 public:
00024         MSWell(FileIO &fio, DataPool* datapool);
00025         ~MSWell();
00026         
00027         // --- public methods ------
00028         virtual void initialize();                                      // initialize well and its controls
00029         virtual void calcProps();                                       // calculate properties for each Newton iter
00030         virtual void linearize(double dt);                      // calculate Well Jacobian (RRJ, WRJ, RWJ, WWJ) 
00031         virtual void calcInitProps();                           // record the wellbore pressures at old time step 
00032         virtual void retract();                                         // retract to old timestep values for vellbore pressure, if can not converge
00033         virtual bool newtonUpdate();                            // Newton update
00034         virtual bool isValidWell(); 
00035         virtual void report(double t);
00036         virtual void addCtrl(char *name, double orate_, double BHPlimit_, double den_);
00037         virtual void witeDataToRestart(ofstream& reStartFile);
00038         virtual void readDataToRestart(ifstream& reStartFile);
00039         virtual void setWellRate(double rate);
00040         virtual void calcStartupProps() { mCurWCont->calcStartupProps(); }
00041 
00042         virtual bool convergeF();
00043         virtual bool convergeDY();
00044         
00045         // Overruling functions 
00046         virtual double  getBHP()                        { return mSegPres[0]; }
00047         virtual void    setFluidModel(Fluid *f);
00048 
00049         virtual void thermalUpdate();                           // thermal update
00050 
00051         virtual void expandWellJacobian();      // expand Jacobian or Thermal 
00052 
00053         GPRS_Matrix* getWWJ_Mat()  { return mCurWCont->getWWJ_Mat(); }
00054         GPRS_Matrix* getWRJ_Mat()  { return mCurWCont->getWRJ_Mat(); }
00055         GPRS_Matrix* getRWJ_Mat()  { return mCurWCont->getRWJ_Mat(); }
00056 
00057 
00058         friend class MSWellCont;
00059         friend class MSWellBHPCont;
00060         friend class MSWellORateCont;
00061         friend class MSWellWRateCont;
00062         friend class MSWellGRateCont;
00063         friend class MSWellLRateCont;
00064         friend class MSWellTimedORateCont;
00065 
00066 protected:
00067                 
00068         int    nSegConns;                               // number of connections between segments, which is strictly equal to 
00069                                                                         // off-diagonal blocks, see below;
00070         Conn2P   *mSegConns;                    // array of connections, which discribe the relations of segments;
00071 
00072         ofstream segOutput;
00073         
00074         double *mSegPres;                               // array containing pressure of all segments, unit: psi
00075         double *mSegVm;                                 // array containing fluid mixture velocity of all segments, unit: ft/day
00076         double *mSegHoldupWater;                // array containing water holdup of all segments, unit: NONE
00077         double *mSegHoldupGas;                  // array containing gas holdup of all segments, unit: NONE
00078         
00079         double *mOld_SegPres;                   // same to above, but for old timestep
00080         double *mOld_SegVm;
00081         double *mOld_SegHoldupWater;
00082         double *mOld_SegHoldupGas;
00083 
00084         double *mSegTemp;        // array containing temperature of all segments, unit: R
00085         double *mOld_SegTemp;
00086         const double *mTemp;    // reservoir temperature
00087 
00088         char  *mCtrlName;                               // name of well control: BHP, ORate
00089         BOFluid * mBOFluid;                             // fluid variable, the fluid of simulated system, could be: GOW, OW, OG, ...
00090         Fluid * m3PFluid;                               // fluid variable, always 3-phase 3-comp fluid. 
00091                                                                         // copy phase property for mBOFluid, if not 3-phase, 
00092                                                                         // fill the rest with default properties        
00093                                                                         // it is only used within segments.
00094         
00095         double *mWWJ_Diag;                              // core data, diagonal blocks of WWJ matrix
00096         double *mWWJ_OffD_A;                    // core data, off-diagonal blocks of upper WWJ matrix
00097         double *mWWJ_OffD_B;                    // core data, off-diagonal blocks of lower WWJ matrix
00098 
00099         double *mWWJ_Diag_T;                            // core data, diagonal blocks of WWJ matrix
00100         double *mWWJ_OffD_A_T;                  // core data, off-diagonal blocks of upper WWJ matrix
00101         double *mWWJ_OffD_B_T;
00102                 
00103         std::list<MSWellCont *> mWConts;        // list of well controls
00104         MSWellCont* mCurWCont;                          // current well contr
00105         MSWellCont* mOldWCont;                          // last well contr
00106 
00107         WellFlowModel mWellFlowModel;           // Homegeneous or drift-flux model: HO or DF
00108         PresDropType  mPresDropType;            // the pressure drop types: HFA or HF or H ...
00109                                                                                 // H: hydraulic; F: friction; A: acceleration;
00110 
00111         std::vector<Segment*> mSegments;        // list of segments of the well;
00112 
00113         void createData();                              // create data
00114         void setupOutput();
00115         void switchWellCont();                  // switch well control, when current control is not valid any more;
00116         void readData(FileIO &fio);             // read well data
00117         void buildSegConnectionList();  // create segment connnection list;

00119 };
